casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Luis Xavier SOTO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 21, 2017 W. Theodore Koch III, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Linda F. Currie-Zeffiro, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn. App. 739 , 168 A.3d 605 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
